entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 29 January 2023
